text: Blue Blazes is a 1936 American short comedy film directed by Raymond Kane and starring Buster Keaton. ==Premise== Elmer (Buster Keaton) becomes a fireman, but not a particularly good one. He has a chance to prove himself, however, when three women are trapped in a burning building. ==Cast== * Buster Keaton as Elmer * Arthur L.
